original_text: Jesus heard what these people were saying. He said to them, ‘People who are well do not need a doctor. It is people who are ill that need a doctor. Some people think that they always obey God. I did not come to help people like that. Some people know that they have done wrong things. I am asking those people to come to me for help.’
korean_text: 예수께서 들으시고 그들에게 이르시되 건강한 자에게는 의사가 쓸 데 없고 병든 자에게라야 쓸 데 있느니라 나는 의인을 부르러 온 것이 아니요 죄인을 부르러 왔노라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus heard what these people were saying.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 이 사람들이 무엇을 말하고 있는지 들으셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: People who are well do not need a doctor.
It is people who are ill that need a doctor.
Some people think that they always obey God.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 자신이 항상 하나님께 순종한다고 생각합니다.

sentences.original_text: I did not come to help people like that.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그런 사람들을 돕기 위해 온 것이 아닙니다.

sentences.original_text: Some people know that they have done wrong things.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 자신이 잘못된 일을 했다는 것을 알고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: I am asking those people to come to me for help.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 사람들이 도움을 받으려고 내게 오도록 부르고 있습니다.
